question:
What is the correct sequence of Morstein Marxâ€™s classification of bureaucracy given below:
(a) Merit 
(b) Patronage
(c) Caste 
(d) Gurdian
Select the correct answer from the codes given below:
explanation:
According to Morstein Marx, the correct sequence of the classification of bureaucracy is given below:
(i) The Guardian Bureaucracy
(ii) The Caste Bureaucracy
(iii) The Patronage Bureaucracy and
(iv) The Merit Bureaucracy
